column2: that the Appellant had  halted  his business activities upon an  interim
order made by the District Court.

column1: Perusal  of the judgment of the  District Court shows that the Respondent
had  instituted the said  District Court case  to evict the Appellant who
continues to  be in  possession  even after the  lapse of the  lease agreement.

column2: Indeed this fact was not denied  by the  learned counsel  for the  Respondent.

column1: This shows that the Respondents  had  admitted that it was the Appellant

column2: who was  in the possession  of the disputed  premises at least as at the date
